title: Ecell of Ag+ and Al rxn given reduction potentials

content.question: Ag+(aq) + e- → Ag(s) E° = +0.80 V According to the standard reduction potentials given above, what is the standard cell potential for the reaction represented below? 3 Ag+(aq) + Al(s) → 3 Ag(s) + Al3+(aq)

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
